channel.title: Omg 508 help please!
channel.description:
running my server off the berkyscape server/client.... i open client log in.... but when i log out of my account, and try to log back in again it says my password is wrong :S.... this happens with every account i make :S
help please!!!
okay, still not fixed and now another problem has occured... when i go into characters and find my class file for my username to change my player rights is comes up in chinese :O

item.title: Omg 508 help please!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

ya, the way to make yourself admin isn’t through the char files that’ll mess up everything you have to go to login.java and search for “rights” then youll see something like berky rights = 3 and change his name to yours… sorry not too detailed but the best help i can give

Read full topic

item.title: Omg 508 help please!
item.dc:creator: @life-scape life-scape
item.description:
@life-scape wrote:

try the password “password” because if you edited in the login.java file it resets your password to that.

Read full topic
